pr_title: Replace FileSystemContext in presto-raptor by HdfsContext

timeline.message: Replace FileSystemContext in presto-raptor by HdfsContext

timeline.bodyText: We also need all other information other than identity. Schema and table are available in handle. Same for all other places.
timeline.author: highker

replies.bodyText:
Got it. I see that I can get schema and table names from RaptorOutputTableHandle:

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            new HdfsContext(session.getIdentity()),
          
          
            
                            new HdfsContext(session, handle.getSchemaName(), handle.getTableName())
replies.author: fvcortes

timeline.bodyText: leave an empty line between constants and variables
timeline.author: highker
highker

timeline.bodyText: But schema and table names are not available in RaptorInsertTableHandle.
timeline.author: fvcortes

replies.bodyText: We can ignore schema/table. But we should populate other fields.
replies.author: highker

timeline.author: fvcortes

replies.bodyText: We can ignore schema and table for page source/sink provider at the moment
replies.author: highker

timeline.message: Replace FileSystemContext in presto-raptor by HdfsContext

timeline.bodyText: Could you address the comments https://github.com/prestodb/presto/pull/14680/files#r443993637? We need more than identity.
timeline.author: highker

replies.bodyText: Should I populate the fields with an empty string?
replies.author: fvcortes

replies.bodyText: Create a new interface public HdfsContext(ConnectorSession session) for HdfsContext
replies.author: highker
highker

replies.bodyText: Ok! Doing an explicit constructor invocation makes it clearer.
replies.author: fvcortes

timeline.message: Replace FileSystemContext in presto-raptor by HdfsContext
Replace FileSystemContext in presto-raptor by HdfsContext

timeline.author: highker

replies.author: fvcortes

replies.bodyText: They are completely different. This is of type String; the other is of type Optional<String>. A null input here will throw NPE.
replies.author: highker

timeline.author: highker

timeline.bodyText: Pass in schema and table as well from handle
timeline.author: highker
highker
